distribution.scatter_chance: (query.block_name(variable.worldx, query.heightmap(variable.worldx, variable.worldz) - 1, variable.worldz) == 'minecraft:grass_block' || query.block_name(variable.worldx, query.heightmap(variable.worldx, variable.worldz) - 1, variable.worldz) == 'minecraft:dirt' || query.block_name(variable.worldx, query.heightmap(variable.worldx, variable.worldz) - 1, variable.worldz) == 'minecraft:podzol') ? 1 : 0
